## SceneUIEventPayloads."SCENE\_UI.SET\_POSITION" property

Emitted when the position of a SceneUI is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[SceneUIEvent.SET_POSITION]: {
        sceneUI: SceneUI;
        position: Vector3Like;
    };
```
